_header: Sometime there was in Newton a hipping Hechi
_description: Richard Newton (died 1336), rhymes on his daughter-in-law — 9 lines

BLAdd42134.First Lines:
Sometime there was in Neuton a hipping hechin
                    Heo badd oxen and kye and Corne for the maistrie…
BLAdd42134.Last Lines:
…That vnder of the day
                    That I noe sleepe may
